profile:
DrainWorks Plumbing is a customer-first, Toronto-based plumbing company providing full plumbing services, drain cleaning, drain repair and drain replacement. All our plumbers are 100% licensed, insured and commission-free! We take great pride in being one of the most reviewed companies on HomeStars in North America! We are also proud to say that we have been chosen (twice) as the "best plumber in the city" by Toronto Life magazine, as evidenced by their "Busy person's survival guide" issue. High praise from a wonderful and trusted publication! 

We employ full-time salaried plumbers rather than commission-based plumbers that are motivated to up-sell you. All of the DrainWorks plumbers in Toronto and surrounding areas are fully licensed, insured, and professionally trained. We are also proud to say that 100% of our employees have been with us for 10 years or more. Finally, an experienced local plumber near you that you can trust and rely on!
 
Further, we've recently had the honor of being one of a select few companies across all trades, hand picked by Gemini award winning TV host and contractor, Bryan Baeumler, of HGTV's Leave it to Bryan and Disaster DIY to be Baeumler Approved. A high mark of quality, indeed. 
 
You can count on DrainWorks for all your plumbing and drain-related needs in Toronto. Our plumbers are ready for your call with clear and upfront pricing and will always arrive on-time and fully prepared with everything they can foreseeably need.

DrainWorks Plumbing also likes to help and support our local Toronto community and charities, such as for the Easter Seals and SickKids Foundation.
Please take a few moments to read these plumbing reviews from our customers, so you too can learn about and take advantage of the ‘DrainWorks Difference’. We hope you choose us for your next call to the plumber!

**COVID-19 UPDATE - DrainWorks Plumbing is open and in full operation adhering to all Covid-19 protocols in place to offer the help you need when you need it most keeping everyone safe.**

profile:
Based in York Region, Southern Ontario Dan "The Drawer" Man specializes in custom sliding drawers for existing cabinets in your home. Also known as pull out shelves, gliding shelves, roll out shelves, cabinet drawers or sliding shelves but whatever you call them, sliding drawers will organize your kitchen, pantry, linen closets, armoires or bathroom vanity’s and make your life a whole lot easier. You will never get on your hands and knees to get something out of your kitchen cabinets again! All of our sliding drawers for your kitchen storage, pantry and bathroom cabinets are strictly custom made by my hands to your existing cabinet’s dimensions. No alterations to your existing cabinets will be made. I offer high quality workmanship that is very strong and durable. Dan "The Drawer" Man will come out to your home with a sample and will create a layout for your personal style and budget. Not only will I come to your home to create a layout for you, I will personally construct and install the finished product in a very short period of time. I have done your homework for you – Dan "The Drawer" Man’s prices are about 50% lower than similar companies offering the same service. That is a huge saving for you. I keep my overhead very low and pass on the savings to you. I offer a high quality product, excellent service for a very, very reasonable price.
References available upon request
Many very satisfied customers
Fully customized to your request
100 lb Accuride full extention hardware included
Fast installation
Servicing Southern Ontario 
Satisfaction Guaranteed
Lifetime Warranty

profile:
The Bath Solutions Story . . . About Us

Bath Solutions specializes in bathroom renovations of all sizes, from full-scale to partial renovations. We offer solutions for all aspects of bathroom renovation including Acrylic Tub Liners, Custom Bath Wall Systems, Tub to Shower Conversions, Walk-in Bathtubs and much more. We truly offer all possible options, and you can choose which option fits your particular situation, home style, and budget.

Bath Solutions was established in 1996 and in January 2011 opened up a showroom in Toronto, we pride ourselves on having professional and knowledgeable staff from quotation to project completion, who are willing to assist you through every step of your project.

Our commitment to provide you the highest quality materials, installation expertise, and service truly make us the “Bathroom Renovation Specialists”.

Bath Solutions’ proven ability to service the needs of our valued customers is evident by the number of referrals we receive on an ongoing basis. You can be assured that we will be here to serve your needs for today and in the future.

No matter where you live, will be able to meet and exceed your bathroom renovation needs…  just give us a call!

profile:
From the year 1989 Brampton Kitchen & Cabinets Ltd. has been designing and manufacturing Custom Cabinetry, with Custom Kitchens being its flagship service. Brampton Kitchen follows a set of ethical values and professional procedures. We operate with the highest level of integrity and rigidly adhere to the policy of customer service, accountability and skill. We are a credible organization that stands behind its product. 
Extensive experience of several years and expertise of best artisans and craftsmen, we create designs that stand out. Be it your Kitchen, Bathroom, Vanity, Entertainment Unit, Bar or Walk-in Closet we have the skills to meet your every need. Our thorough knowledge of our trade is our biggest asset. We learn about your lifestyle while working alongside with you, so as to tailor your kitchen or cabinetry according to your specifications. From Planning to Designing to Manufacturing, we make sure you love every step along the way. We educate you about the industry, current trends and styles so that you make an informed decision.  We can turn your dream into reality without having to compromise on budget or quality.

profile:
Rosewood Kitchens is a family owned custom cabinetry company, specializing in creating custom kitchen cabinets, washroom vanities, office cabinets, islands, and bars. With a passion for re-modelling spaces, Rosewood Kitchens is committed to creating beautiful spaces for your home and office using only the best quality materials and skilled craftsmanship. Having over 25 years of carpentry experience, we incorporate the use of the latest technologies and hardware, along with rich woods and textures to create a unique space that fits each client’s needs.

Are You Ready To Make Your Dream Kitchen A Reality? Well, Look No Further! Here At Rosewood Kitchens, Fine Cabinetry Is Revealed As You Look Beyond The Exterior Beauty And Into Its Components, Construction, And Finishing. We Invite You To Explore What Rosewood Kitchens Has To Offer!

profile:
Bathtub refinishing evolved into an essential part of the renovation industry.

Loumerico Bathtub Refinishing offers a service that allows the homeowners to completely restore bathtubs, sinks, counter tops and ceramic wall tiles without the expensive costs of replacement.

  Our System

OUR SYSTEM
EP-ACRYLIC is a specialized and custom designed coating which has been developed to meet constantly changing industry needs and growing public concern.
 

EP-ACRYLIC is a high-performance acrylic-based coating with all the advantages of acrylic urethane that was developed for the automotive and furniture industry with one exception. It contains NO ISOCYANATES! This means it is safe for use in homes. around food and people as well as in professional business and doctor's offices.

  

ADVANTAGES:

 

Outstanding durability

High UV and color retention

Excellent initial gloss and gloss retention

High flexibility

Fast drying

Long-term durability

Protects against industrial airborne chemicals

Excellent adhesion on all types of materials

Maintains water-repellency

High hardness

Non-lapping

 

EP-ACRYLIC coating systems are to be used wherever exposure to a wide variety of elements is anticipated and whenever marring or scratching is a problem or continued endurance must be expected over an extended period of time.

 

The appearance, exceptional adhesion, low curing time and temperature resistance of this system is suitable not only to metal and concrete surfaces but to newer structural materials such as polyester fiberglass, structural foams, porcelain, ceramic tile, nylon and many plastics.

​

The EP-ACRYLIC system has been found to be superior to epoxies and acrylic urethane re-surfacing systems.
services:
best bathtub refinishing company
WHAT DO WE DO?

​

We use a multi-step process to resurface your tubs, tiles, acrylics, marble, fiberglass, arborite, countertops and cabinets. We can also do chip repairs and apply ASTM F 462 Approved Slip Resistant Surfaces as a safety feature for bathtubs.

​

Bathroom tubs, tiles, sinks, claw foot tubs, kitchen sinks, counter-tops, cabinets are all examples of surfaces and appliances that can be serviced.

​

A great advantage to this system is that color matching is possible, which gives even further reason not to replace everything!

We service residential clients, hotels, and other commercial clients.

​

WHAT DO WE USE?

​

We use EP-Acrylic by Integrity Coatings. This is the finest product that we know of available today. Integrity's products have all proven their quality and durability over time, and are isocyanide free for the protection of our technicians and our clients.

​

We do not use epoxy enamel even though it is much cheaper, because it does not stand the test of time. We do not use polyurethanes because lab tests have proven that these products, with repeated exposures, are extremely detrimental to people's health.
